review_data.title: Classic Italian
review_data.content: We ate here near our hotel in the Teknopark area. The food was excellent with a number of classic Italian choices to suit everyone’s tastes. They had a nice Chianti Classico that we enjoyed. Recommend— nice outdoors seating in a quiet area.
